CustomField.description:
Total sum of related packaging segment open opportunity records. This count is performed and mapped by the 360 custom setting.
Source field = C360_Sum_of_Packaging_Opps__c.
Criteria for open packaging is opportunity segment = packaging and stage is not equal to closed.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Total Annual Opportunity Revenue of all open packaging opportunities
CustomField.label: Open Packaging Opportunities
